title:
All Next-Next-to-Extremal One-Loop Correlators of AdS Supergluons and
  Supergravitons
authors: Zhongjie Huang, Bo Wang, Ellis Ye Yuan
abstract:
We bootstrap all of the next-next-to-extremal one-loop four-point correlators
of supergravitons and supergluons in ${\rm AdS_5}$ using a differential
representation, and obtain closed formulas that are valid in both position
space and Mellin space simultaneously.
